name: Ruins (Chaoseed)
description:
A prototype exploration game for ProcJam. You wander around a generated level. And that IS what this game is...but it will definitely be more complicated later!

CONTROLS: CLICK STUFF! Note that if you click the upper part of the playfield, you'll go upward; the right part, you'll go right, etc.. Clicking the corners is supposed to have other effects. Clicking the middle should do nothing.

Update Nov. 30: Should work much better on mobile screens! I can now play it on my phone, so that's progress.
